com.flir.flironesdk

Interface Device.Delegate

  • Enclosing class:
    Device

    public static interface Device.Delegate
    Defines callback methods for device state updates

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAutomaticTuningChanged(boolean deviceWillTuneAutomatically)
      Called when the device confirms enabling or disabling the automatic tuning function.
      void onDeviceConnected(Device device)
      Called when the device has completed connecting and is ready for streaming
      void onDeviceDisconnected(Device device)
      Called when the device has disconnected for any reason
      void onTuningStateChanged(Device.TuningState newTuningState)
      Called when the tuning state of the device changes, which will indicate the device is in the process of being tuned, has completed tuning, or may require tuning for high thermal accuracy.

    • Method Detail

      • onTuningStateChanged

        void onTuningStateChanged(Device.TuningState newTuningState)
        Called when the tuning state of the device changes, which will indicate the device is in the process of being tuned, has completed tuning, or may require tuning for high thermal accuracy.
        Parameters:
        newTuningState - The new tuning state of the device

      • onAutomaticTuningChanged

        void onAutomaticTuningChanged(boolean deviceWillTuneAutomatically)
        Called when the device confirms enabling or disabling the automatic tuning function.
        Parameters:
        deviceWillTuneAutomatically - The newly applied setting for automatic tuning. True if device will automatically tune.

      • onDeviceConnected

        void onDeviceConnected(Device device)
        Called when the device has completed connecting and is ready for streaming
        Parameters:
        device - The object representing the connected device. You should use this object to perform device operations such as starting frame streaming and contolling tuning.

      • onDeviceDisconnected

        void onDeviceDisconnected(Device device)
        Called when the device has disconnected for any reason
        Parameters:
        device - The device that was disconnected.
